mapper.insert: INSERT INTO auction (auctionNum, minPrice,buyPrice,aucEnd,amount,species, subject, content,categoryNum,num) VALUES (#{auctionNum}, #{minPrice},#{buyPrice},#{aucEnd},#{amount},#{species},#{subject},#{content},#{categoryNum},#{num})
mapper.select: SELECT auctionNum, subject, m.userId, content, amount, TO_CHAR(a.created, 'YYYY-MM-DD') created, aucEnd species,minPrice,buyPrice,aucEnd, categoryNum, a.num, hitCount FROM auction a JOIN member m ON a.num=m.num WHERE auctionNum=#{auctionNum}
mapper.update: UPDATE auction SET hitCount=hitCount+1 WHERE auctionNum=#{auctionNum}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO bid (bidNum, bidPrice, num, auctionNum) VALUES(bid_seq.NEXTVAL,#{bidPrice}, #{num},#{auctionNum})
mapper.select: SELECT userId,NVL(MAX(bidPrice),0) bidPrice FROM bid b JOIN member m ON b.num=m.num
